conversations.content: Check it out, Euden. These flowers are iced over, too.
You're right. The leaves and petals are all frozen solid.
Who the heck would pull a stunt like this? It's a forest, for cryin' out loud! Have some freakin' decency!
Eeeeeeeeek!
The hell was that?!
It came from those bushes. Come on!
Stooop! Stay back!
Graaargh!
Nooo! Somebody, heeeeelp!
Hyaaaaa!
You there! Run while you can!
...Huh? Someone actually came?
Keep yer eyes on the enemy, Euden!
Grraaaagh!
Uh oh...
Oh, no! I have to do something! ....Hiiiiiiya!
...Holy crap. She froze the fiend!
Finish it off already!
Oh, right. Hiiiiyaaah!
...Thanks for the save. But if I can ask, what are you doing in this forest?
I'm Lily, and I'm searching for a flower. Also, I should be thanking YOU!
There's flowers all over this joint, yeah? Just pick one ya like and get outta here.
I'm not just looking for any old flower— I'm looking for a flower that won't freeze.
Wait, what?
Ah, I get it now. You're the one who froze all the flowers in the forest.
Every flower I touch always turns to ice. But I know there has to be one out there that won't, so I'm looking for it.
Anyway, I'm really sorry to have caused trouble, but I'll be fine now. See ya!
Lily, wait! ...Look, if you want help, I'm happy to help you search for this flower.
Er, really? B-but...
There's no reason to search for it alone. It will be easier—and heck, more fun— if we do it together.
You're...really gonna help me look?
Sure, why not?
That's GREAT! Thank you so, so, SOOOO much, Euden!
Waaaaaah! I'm soooooorry!
I'm not upset, Lily. You do not have to... Oh dear.
Ah, Your Highness! Perfect timing. We could use a hand.
What're you two doing in this flower bed? ...Er, and why are they all frozen?
I wanted to find a flower that won't freeze. And since there were lots of pretty flowers here, I thought that maybe...
So that's how they ended up on ice, huh? Well, don't worry about it. It's not like the flowers inside the castle were frozen.
Actually, Your Highness...they were.
Wait, ALL of them?!
I thought maybe one of those wouldn't freeze, so I... Yeah.
It seems Lily's chilly aura is so strong, a flower struck by it is difficult to thaw.
...Wow, you're right. These are all hard as rocks.
The frozen flowers are heavy, and the edges sharp. We should pick them before any children happen to wander by.
Man, this sucks! I can freeze pretty much whatever, but I can never get stuff to go back to normal.
I'm sorry. It's all my fault.
I told you that we are not angry. Isn't that right, Your Highness?
...Er, Your Highness? You're staring at the flowers and smiling like a madman. This concerns me.
Lily, these are amazing!
Muh?
I've never seen something so beautiful... They look like blown glass!
And you said they don't defrost, right? In that case, I bet we could decorate the whole castle with them!
B-but it's my fault that we have to pluck all the nice flowers that everyone worked so hard to raise. Um...right?
Well then, we'll just have to plant lots of new seeds. It'll be fine, so long as we all pitch in to help grow and nurture them.
But you're the only one who could freeze these flowers and create something so beautiful, Lily. That's a very special thing.
That's right. Your frosty aura has preserved the beauty of these flowers forever.
Let's decorate all the rooms of the castle with them—it will add a delightfully cheery chill!
Are you guys for real right now?
Of course we're for real!
I thoroughly agree. You've quite the amazing talent, Lily.
Aw, thanks! That makes me so happy!
Good evening. Um, can I come in?
You're not asleep yet, Lily? Is something wrong?
Um, well, it's 'cause outside it's all flash and flash and KABOOM.
Sorry, I don't follow.
Eeek! That! The big flash and boom! I'm scaaaaared!
Ah, I get it. You're afraid of thunder. Well, let's chat until you can fall asleep. Here, have a seat.
Aw, thanks.
When I was younger, my little sister used to come into my room at night and make me stay up until she fell asleep.
My big sister would always talk to me when I got scared, too.
She'd squeeze my hand real tight, and then I wouldn't be afraid anymore.
She sounds very nice.
Yeah. And she told me that whenever I feel lonely, I should look for the flower that never freezes.
She said that would make it so I wasn't lonely anymore. And that even if I didn't find it, I'd still end up having fun.
And do you think she was right? I wonder if she had something specific in mind.
I dunno.
Well, are you lonely right now, Lily? Or are you having fun?
I'm having tons and tons of fun 'cause I'm with everyone!
Then you should stay with us forever and keep looking for your flower.
Really?! I can do that?!
Of course you can!
Yaaaay!
Eeeeeek!
You gonna be okay?
...Hee hee!
Yeah, okay. I don't think I'm scared anymore.
Zzzzzz...
Heh. Sleep tight, Lily.
Thank you for finding me...
Blaaargh! It is TOO damn hot around here. What say we pick back up after the sun sets, Euden?
I'm a sweaty mess too, Ranzal, but we have to finish this.
Afternooooon!
Hey there, Lily.
Heya, kid. Yer lookin' chipper.
Yeppers! ...Um, whatcha doing?
Repairin' the castle wall. It's crumbled in spots, so we gotta lay new stones to shore up our defenses.
We never know when fiends might attack, after all.
Woooow. You guys are sweaaaaa-ty!
I don't mind physical labor, but it's hot as the hubs'a hell out here today. Not even a lick of shade to work under.
Heat or no, we have to hurry and repair the wall so everyone is safe.
Yeah, I know. But man, I'd give my big toe for a breeze right now. Heck, I'd give ALL my toes! Even the piggy one.
Hey, I've got a good idea! I'll blow a wind on the two of you!
Er, what do you mean, exactly?
Watch and learn! Here I gooo!
Oh wow... That feels AMAZING.
Hey, all my sweat's dryin' up! Now we're talkin'!
That better?
Lily, I didn't know you could use your icy powers for things like this.
Hee hee!
Well, ain't you two gettin' to be fast friends?
Heh...
Well, you guys are helping everyone, so I wanna do what I can, too.
Not that there's anything I can really do...
Don't say that, Lily. Thanks to your breeze, I feel stronger than ever! Right, Ranzal?
Damn straight. Ya really saved the day here, kid.
Really?! I'm so happy I was able to help!
All right, back to work. Let's try to get this wrapped up before nightfall.
Lily, give us a breeze, if ya would. And make it ice cold!
Leave it to me! Woooo!
Gya! T-t-too c-c-cold!
All right, we've got food, so we should head back to the castle.
It was super nice of that grocery man to pick out all the freshest fruits and veggies for us!
The townspeople worked hard to raise their crops, so we must be sure to appreciate all of their work.
Glory be! I swear the sun's tryin' to melt me today. I've had sweat runnin' down m'back since I got up with the dawn.
And not one single breeze all day long... It's so hard to think about working when it gets like this.
Everyone looks really hot and unhappy.
Heeeey! You think maybe we could help them as thanks for the tasty food?
Well, it IS the royal family's duty to help the people in times of trouble.
Hmm, good point. You think you can hit 'em with a little cold wind, Lily?
My winds can't reach very far, so I can't cool many people at once...
Hmm. Well, what if we tried...this?
Everyone, listen! We have a present for you from Lily!
Um...I wanted to help all of you cool off, so I froze these flowers.
Y'wanna run that by us again?
Here, have one!
Yowza! It really IS frozen solid. ...And hey, it's coolin' me down already! Thanks a million, little sister.
Hee hee! You're welcome!
They're so beautiful! I want to put one in my room for decoration. Do you have enough for me to take one as well?
Sure! I've got tons! And even if I do run out, I can just go make more.
Well, this is delightful. Thank you, Lily!
Hee hee! No, thank YOU!
Everyone looks quite pleased.
They sure do. What a relief, huh?
And it makes ME happy to see THEM happy! Hee hee!
Hey, sooo...I was just thinking about that time I was looking for the unfreezing flower in the woods, and how I was all alone and sad and scared and stuff?
That's why I was super happy when you guys all found me.
I may not have found a flower that doesn't freeze yet, but the ones I froze in the woods let me meet everyone here, and so now I'm not lonely anymore.
That's why I wanna find people when they're lonely or sad and cheer them up.
And then I'll bring 'em to the castle so they can have fun with everyone here! Um, that's okay, right?
Absolutely. Everyone is welcome here.
Sounds like things are going to get a lot more lively in the near future.
Oh man... You guys are the BEST!
